resources.string: The game «Maze» is a classic maze game in which the player must find a way out and pass the maze.
To pass the labyrinth, the player must lead the red square to the exit, which is marked by a green square.

The game has four levels of difficulty, the difficulty depends on the size of the maze. To fully pass the selected difficulty, the player must pass three mazes in a row. After passing the selected difficulty, the player can save his result.
To view achievements, click the «Achievements» button on the main menu.
Choose a difficulty of the level
